title.creator: FROM THE CREATORS OF ACC TV AND PYRACEENGINEER
title.advertisement-text: When your mirrors are filled with the competition, and your team is depending on you to bring it home, the race should be your focus. ACC DRIVE provides every tool that you need to keep you immersed in the battle, and not off in the menus. It is a fully featured toolkit that gives you and your team the cutting edge needed to win races.
title.community: Join the community and talk with other drivers
title.performance: Small, lightweight and no impact on FPS

feature1.title: Race Engineer
feature1.subtitle: The most important data at hand
feature1.description: The Race Engineer helps you get the right fuel and PSI into your car by looking at your data. Basically like the Session Info Page but local-only

feature2.title: Telemetry
feature2.subtitle: Additional Info on your past sessions
feature2.description: Revel in detailed lap specifics such as time, top- and average-speed, with the additional bonus of TC/ABS intervention stats. Stay on top of your game with active assists and overall stint details showcasing your best lap

feature3.title: Spotting
feature3.subtitle: Sharing and recieving your best laps to help each other out
feature3.description: The Spotting page gives you an easier time keeping an overview of the race. You can see everyone's last and fastest times, how often they pitted, who is currently driving and more

feature4.title: Community
feature4.subtitle: For a better overview of the race
feature4.description: Aside from adding each other as friends via ACC DRIVE, comparing yourself to faster times within the community is now possible as well! After completing a valid lap, your telemetry data is uploaded to our secure server.

feature5.title: Radar
feature5.subtitle: Perfect for close racing
feature5.description: Shows the position of other cars around you. Can be customized for the distance ahead, behind and next to you.

feature6.title: Yellow Flags
feature6.subtitle: The most important data at hand
feature6.description: This is an improvement over the in-game yellow flag system. It adds the distance to an accident, the position and rotation of the crashed car into one system that warns you efficiently before the game does

feature7.title: Full Tyre & Damage App
feature7.subtitle: All the data about your car you will need
feature7.description: This feature shows you the actual values based on the performance of your tires/brakes instead of some random values Kunos is presenting. It also features a damage-model when you take damage

feature8.title: VR Support
feature8.subtitle: ACC DRIVE fully works in VR
feature8.description: When setting up the App you can decide to always position ACC DRIVE in front to put it infront of all other applications
